name: nconst
description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the name/person

name: primaryName
description: name by which the person is most often credited

name: deathYear
description: in YYYY format if applicable, else '\N'

name: primaryProfession
description: the top-3 professions of the person (array of string)

name: knownForTitles
description: titles the person is known for (array of string)
